post.description: To acquire user register information from front-end, and send to the blockchain-apis.

requestBody.description: A JSON object contains user register information.

type.description: the user type to register, 0 for doctor, 1 for hospital, 2 for patient, 3 for maintainer.

hospital_id.description: (Optional) if it is a doctor registration, the hospital_id (will be given from get request /info/hospital/list) of it should be provided

description.description: (Optional) if it is a hospital registration, the description (including the qualification registration number) should be provided

location.description: (Optional) if it is a hospital registration, the location should be provided

example.message: The account has been created successfully.

401.description: bad request, the username already exists

example.message: The user name has already existed.

402.description: bad request, the user number has reached its limitation

example.message: The user number has reached its limitation.

post.description: To acquire user login information from front-end, and send to the blockchain-apis.

requestBody.description: a JSON object contains user login information.

type.description: the user type to login, 0 for doctor, 1 for hospital, 2 for patient, 3 for maintainer.

401.description: bad request, the username does not exist

example.message: The user name does not exist.

post.description: To acquire the forgotten user password.

requestBody.description: A JSON object contains user username and email and user type.

type.description: the user type to register, 0 for doctor, 1 for hospital, 2 for patient, 3 for maintainer.

example.message: The email has been sent, please check.

401.description: bad request, the username or email is wrong

post.description:
To post a information change request for doctor.
REQUIRE: JWTToken in the header!!!

requestBody.description: A JSON object contains name, description or tags to be updated.

tagsArr.description: an array of strings storing all the selected tags

401.description: bad request, already have requested before

example.message: Your last request is still pending, please wait
Wrong user type! You are not allowed to visit.

get.description: To let the hospital get the doctor update request.

201.description: success, but there is no update request currently

example.message: Wrong user type! You are not allowed to visit.

post.description: To post the checked doctor update request from hospital

requestBody.description: A JSON object contains the approved doctors id (given when use info/check/get) and the decision from hospital(could be approved or rejected)

decision.description: decision from hospital, could be approved or rejected

401.description: bad request, request does not exist

example.message: Wrong user type! You are not allowed to visit.

get.description: To let the hospital get the unvrified doctor account.

201.description: success, but there is no unverified doctors currently

example.message: Wrong user type! You are not allowed to visit.

get.description: To let the maintainer get the unvrified hospital account.

201.description: success, but there is no unverified hospitals currently

example.message: Wrong user type! You are not allowed to visit.

post.description: To post the checked doctor account from hospital

requestBody.description: A JSON object contains the approved doctor's id (given when use /verification/unverified/doctor)

401.description: bad request, doctor not in the hospital

example.message: doctor is not in your hospital
Wrong user type! You are not allowed to visit.

post.description: To post the checked hospital account from maintainer

requestBody.description: A JSON object contains the approved hospital's id (given when use /verification/unverified/hospital)

example.message: Wrong user type! You are not allowed to visit.

post.description: Need to be done by ZYL, SFY. Check whether the username is occupied, store the registered information if not

requestBody.description: A JSON object contains user register information.

type.description: the user type to register, 0 for doctor, 1 for hospital, 2 for patient, 3 for maintainer.

hospital_id.description: (Optional) if it is a doctor registration, the hospital_id (will be given from get request /info/hospital/list) of it should be provided

created.description: the accout is successfully created, return the id and message, every user's id should be dictinct, no matter what type of user

post.description: Need to be done by ZYL, SFY. Check whether the username exists and whetehr password matches

requestBody.description: A JSON object contains user login information.

type.description: the user type to login, 0 for doctor, 1 for hospital, 2 for patient, 3 for maintainer.

match.description: the username exists and match with the password, return the id, type and message

not match.description: the username exists, but the password is wrong

post.description: Need to be done by ZYL, SFY. Check whether the username and email matches and exists, and return the password if matches

requestBody.description: A JSON object contains the username and email

match.description: the username and email exists and matches with each other, return the password of this user

not match.description: the username does not exists, or the email and username does not match

post.description: send feedback information from backend to blockchain

requestBody.description: A JSON object contains feedback information.

score.description: the score made by the patient

post.description: send patient list who made feedback to a doctor from blockchain to backend

requestBody.description: A JSON object contains doctor id.

post.description: approve patient feedback request, send back the feedback score of that doctor made by the patient

requestBody.description: A JSON object contains doctor id and patient id.

score.description: the score that patient marks for that doctor
